title: Great Ocean Road Escape at Lorne's Only Beachfront Hotel
description:
Set off for Australia's most iconic coastal road and immerse yourself in scenic seaside charm at Mantra Lorne, the area's only beachfront hotel. Drive through winding roads, hear waves crashing and take in the majestic natural landscape of one of Australia's most beautiful destinations.

Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, an A$50 dining credit per room towards dinner at The Larder, two A$20 Endota Day Spa vouchers per room, a two-for-one drinks voucher, free Wi-Fi and a 12pm late checkout.

title: Peppers Great Ocean Road Getaway - Golfing Inclusions, Daily Breakfasts And More
description: Escape to the gateway of Victoria's iconic Great Ocean Road in Torquay with a stay at Peppers The Sands Resort. A golfers' dream, you'll have access to the on-site 18-hole championship golf course, with two-for-one green fees throughout your stay. Also included for two people is daily breakfast, one tasty sharing pizza, a welcome drink each and a leisurely 11am check-out.

vendor_name: The Deep Blue Hot Springs Warrnambool
title: Victoria's First Hot Springs Hotel: Laidback Great Ocean Road Escape
description:
Follow the winding coastal route of the Great Ocean Road to Deep Blue Hotel & Hot Springs, Victoria's first hot springs hotel. Situated in picturesque Warrnambool, this is a welcome escape from the city and a chance to pamper mind, body and soul. Soak in the healing waters of the onsite geothermal rock pools, drift in the mist of the aromatherapy pool, beguilingly scented with a bespoke seasonal blend, indulge in light therapy within the sensory cave and meditate in the soothing reflection bay. Round out the experience with a massage at the day spa and a seafood feast at the onsite restaurant, before throwing open your doors to the sea breeze on your studio's private balcony.

Beyond this welcoming sanctuary lie the charms of the Great Ocean Road, home to iconic natural wonders including the Twelve Apostles, Erskine Falls, Lorne Beach and Loch Ard Gorge. Build a relaxing break at Deep Blue Hotel & Hot Springs into a longer road trip itinerary or simply enjoy the delights of Warrnambool, renowned for its art gallery, maritime museum and beautiful lookouts.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Relax in the hotel's soothing onsite mineral springs Sanctuary with one lunchtime pass for two
- Wine and dine with A$25 food and drinks credit per package, per day
- Enjoy a bottle of red or white wine on arrival
- Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi

**Ocean-View Upgrade:** Wake up to the sea breeze and ocean views from your private balcony when you upgrade.
offer_address: Worm Bay Rd, Warrnambool VIC 3280, Australia

title: Historic Great Ocean Road Escape with Tower Hill Nature Reserve Tickets
description:
Embrace the rolling hills and dramatic coastline of the Great Ocean Road at Harmony at Tower Hill, offering historic accommodation near Port Fairy. Combining the charm of the past with contemporary comforts this tranquil reprieve - situated along one of Victoria's most spectacular drives - consists of former classrooms, converted into stylish studios.

Discover the Indigenous history of Tower Hill Nature Reserve with two tour tickets included in your package, plus enjoy a welcome breakfast hamper and guaranteed 11am checkout.
offer_address: Princes Hwy & Lake View Road, Tower Hill VIC 3283

title: Iconic Great Ocean Road Escape with Dinner at Award-Winning MoVida Lorne Restaurant
description: Escape to Victoria’s Great Ocean Road with a stay at Lorne Hotel, a local icon thanks to its ocean views, breezy outdoor beer garden and award-winning MoVida Lorne tapas restaurant. A set-menu dinner for two is included here, giving you the opportunity to experience delicious, traditionally Spanish food as you take in expansive ocean views and the friendly buzz that add to the restaurant’s charm. Your escape also includes one nightly cocktail per person and a leisurely 11am checkout.

title: Peppers Great Ocean Road Escape
description:
Experience the raw beauty of Victoria’s Great Ocean Road at Peppers The Sands Resort Torquay, less than a 1.5-hour drive from Melbourne. Perfect for those in search of coastal walks, a golf or surf escape or simply some time away from the city, this seaside resort - featuring an 18-hole golf course, health club with indoor lap pool, tennis courts and more - is your gateway to everything the Great Ocean Road has to offer.

**Exclusive extras**:

- Daily breakfast
- Complimentary bottle of wine
- 50% discount on green fees

title: Award-Winning Great Ocean Road Retreat
description:
Discover one of Australia’s great architectural masterpieces with a stay at the renowned RACV Torquay Resort. Tucked away in the seaside town of Torquay, at the beginning of the iconic Great Ocean Road and just under 90 minutes from Melbourne, this designer hotel invites you to discover the region’s exquisite surf, café culture and postcard landmarks.

Stay in sophisticated comfort overlooking Bass Strait and the resort's championship 18-hole golf course while also enjoying five-star facilities, including the ultra-stylish One Spa, a fully-equipped fitness centre and three elegant dining venues.
